amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part B of House Report 116-143 as en bloc No. 10: Nos. 239, 240, 241, 242, 243, 244, 245, 246, 247, 248, 249, 250, 252, 253, 254, 255, 256, 257, 258, 259, 260, 261, 262, 263, and 264.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Horn, Kendra S. amendments (A038) Agreed to by voice vote.
